723402f-a.title: Manhattan: Stanton Street - Bowery
723402f-a.text:
(1)
2 to 16 Stanton Street, at, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner
of the Bowery. Nos. 4 to 8 are 3-story frame houses. In the fore-
ground, is the Third Ave. Elevated Line.
May 9, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing a closer view of Nos. 2 to 8. Nos. 4 to 8 are
3-story frame houses.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies,Collection Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 139.
CREDIT LINE IMIPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.

716774f-a.title: Manhattan: Bowery - Stanton Street
716774f-a.text:
239-229 Bowery, east side, south from Stanton Street, as seen from
Prince Street. Also shown is Prince Street, at the N... corner of the
Bowery. The view shows Gabel's Theatre, at Nos. 235-237 Bowery.
August 18, 1929.
P L. Sperr.
NO RER(ODUCTIONS.

716775f-a.title: Manhattan: Stanton Street - Bowery
716775f-a.text:
(1)
Bowery, at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Stanton Street.
Also shown is Sganton Street, south side, east from but not including
the Bewery, to Chrystie Street.
October 12, 1930.
L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, a further view northward.
May 5, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
